mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, b.students_id AS studentsId, s.students_name AS studentsName, title, content, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(b.update_at,'%Y-%m-%d'), '-') AS updateAt, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createAt, b.cnt FROM board b inner join students s on b.students_id = s.students_id
SELECT title, content, create_at, cnt FROM board WHERE board_id = #{id}

SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, b.students_id AS studentsId, s.students_name AS studentsName, title, content, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(b.update_at,'%Y-%m-%d'), '-') AS updateAt, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createAt, b.cnt AS cnt FROM board b inner join students s on b.students_id = s.students_id WHERE s.students_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{studentsName},'%')
